DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare two method remote genetic counseling ( telephone two-way videoconferencing ) patient receive disclosure APOE ( apolipoprotein E ) genotype . The target population consist male females age range 60-75 year , potential participant study ( Generation Study ) , need receive genetic counseling disclosure APOE genotype . Subjects must willing receive genetic counseling disclosure remotely . Subjects must willing randomized either telephone arm videoconference arm .
DOC.brief_title: Telephone Versus Videoconference Communication Remote Genetic Disclosure APOE4 Trial
DOC.criteria: 1 . Eligible participate Generation Study 2 . Ability provide consent 3 . Ability communicate hear English
